SEARCH
Package com.google.genkit.core.middleware

Class CommonMiddleware

java.lang.Object
com.google.genkit.core.middleware.CommonMiddleware
public final class CommonMiddleware extends Object
CommonMiddleware provides factory methods for creating commonly-used middleware functions.

      O - output type

      Creates a retry middleware with exponential backoff and custom retry predicate.
      Type Parameters:
      I - input type
      O - output type
      Parameters:
      maxRetries - maximum number of retry attempts
      initialDelayMs - initial delay between retries in milliseconds
      shouldRetry - predicate to determine if an exception should trigger a retry
      Returns:
      a retry middleware

      O - output type

      O - output type
      Parameters:

    • rateLimit

      public static <I, O> Middleware<I,O> rateLimit(int maxRequests, long windowMs)
      Creates a rate limiting middleware (simple token bucket implementation).
      Type Parameters:
      I - input type
      O - output type
      Parameters:
      maxRequests - maximum requests allowed in the time window
      windowMs - time window in milliseconds
      Returns:
      a rate limiting middleware
